Topic.Title: Posting images and possibly video....how to?

Posts.EditableText:
I would like to ask for help and the best way is to show screenshots.
Most postings have XML snippets and I'm not that strong in that area yet.
I see some users have screenshots and the odd one has video.
How do I include screenshots in my forum postings? There is nothing mentioned in the Forum Help Guide.
